channel.title: I need help with Samsung Slyde!
channel.description:
I just got the samsung slyde but idk how to put music on it. Ive looked everywhere but here and no1 knows plz help
~Scipyo

item.title: I need help with Samsung Slyde!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

If you want to drag and drop, you need to go into the settings on the phone and change it to use USB Mass Storage vs MTP. Samsung phones are MTP by default, or at least mine is.

item.title: I need help with Samsung Slyde!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Go to My Computer if you’re on Windows. And look for the device there. If it’s not there, go to http://www.samsung.com/ and check out their support area for help on it.

http://www.samsung.com/us/support/guides/howToGuideSearchList.do?group=&group_cd=&type=mobilephones&type_cd=01010000&subtype=sprint&subtype_cd=01010200&model_nm=SPH-M540&dType=D&mType=&model_cd=&menu=guides&prd_ia_cd=01010200&disp_nm=Rant+(SPH-m540)&isEqualsY=

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with Samsung Slyde!
item.dc:creator: @scipyo scipyo
item.description:
@scipyo wrote:

I don’t have the SD or MicroSD. I used the cord but i cant find my phone’s files on the computer
i dont see where i drag and drop my songs onto.
and i searched lik google.ca youtube.com anywhere i could think of.

~Scipyo
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 08:48:43 am[/size][hr]Oh one more thing i never got a CD it just downloaded it from the internet.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Samsung Slyde!

item.title: I need help with Samsung Slyde!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

If you have an SD card reader you can use a MicroSD card>SD Card converter and pop it in there, and drag and drop music files. If you don’t, if your PC has Bluetooth you can transfer it that way. If you don’t have Bluetooth you can use the proprietary USB data transfer cable, and transfer it that way. And if all else fails, you can use the phones web browser and download songs from at&t’s website.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Samsung Slyde!

item.title: I need help with Samsung Slyde!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

There should be a USB cable and driver CD provided with the phone. You first pop the CD into your computer install the program and driver and then connect the cable to the phone and computer. You can then drag and drop music files to the removable disk.

When you say “everywhere” what do you mean?

Read full topic
